hero.heading: We're on a mission to make API development easier
hero.subheading: Hoppscotch is a tool that helps you create, test, and document APIs.

1.description: GitHub Stars
1.title: 40K+

values.description: These values are more than just aspirational jargon that we come up with to check a box. They are the foundational framing we use when assessing potential partners to join our team.

build.description: We are building a company that will last. We are building a product that will last. We are building a team that will last. We are building a culture that will last. We are building a community that will last.
build.title: Build for the long term

dream.description: Our promise to each other is to lead with originality and creativity. We approach each problem and opportunity with fearless energy and passion. You will never do boring work at Hoppscotch because ‚Äúgreat‚Äù is never good enough.
dream.title: Dream big

empathy.description: From users to partners to colleagues - we default to respect. We ask thoughtful questions and make time to talk. We offer a hand or two. Above all, we know that we only succeed when our users succeed.
empathy.title: Empathy, always

grow.description: Through a culture of learning and non-complacency, we are always improving. We seek out the hardest problems that have the most impact. We inspire each other. The power of a growth mindset enables us to accomplish amazing things.
grow.title: Grit to grow

ownership.description: With a bias for action, we take pride in our work and our results. We‚Äôre accountable to one another. We cultivate trust with our users. We communicate with transparency and above all, we operate with integrity.
ownership.title: Ownership mindset

velocity.description: We believe quality and speed are not binary choices. We ship work early, welcome feedback, fail fast, and iterate. We learn from the best to hone our crafts and draw inspiration from unlikely places.
velocity.title: High velocity

values.title: Our core values

hero.heading: Blog
hero.subheading: Updates about Hoppscotch and the stuffs we‚Äôre working on.

1.author: Liyas Thomas
1.description: Today Hoppscotch is launching Teams Collaboration support with no caps.
1.title: Create Teams for Collaboration in Hoppscotch

2.author: Liyas Thomas
2.description: Today we're rolling out Hoppscotch v2 for everyone.
2.title: Hoppscotch v2

3.author: Liyas Thomas
3.description: We have come a long way and we are excited to share the latest milestones in our journey.
3.title: Hoppscotch raises $3M in seed funding to build open source API development ecosystem

4.author: Liyas Thomas
4.description: Since the initial commit (~2 years ago), Hoppscotch has evolved from being an open-source side project to an enterprise developer tool ...
4.title: Hoppscotch is celebrating 30,000 GitHub Stars üéâ

5.author: Liyas Thomas
5.description: We are super excited to be a ‚ÄòPartner Organization‚Äô of GitHub Externship and look forward to supporting all interested students to participate and contribute to our open-source projects.
5.title: GitHub Externship ‚ù§Ô∏è Hoppscotch

6.author: Liyas Thomas
6.description: Hoppscotch just received its 25,000th star on GitHub. We'll use this milestone to recap Hoppscotch‚Äôs growth and other important milestones since its beginning ...
6.title: Hoppscotch Celebrating 25,000 GitHub Stars

7.author: Liyas Thomas
7.description: We're developing Hoppscotch, an open-source API request builder for the web, and would love to count you as a contributor to improve our components & applications.
7.title: Hacktoberfest with Hoppscotch

9.author: Liyas Thomas
9.description: The story behind Hoppscotch, The very first task I was assigned is an API integration of an old project. That's when I came across the Postman...
9.title: Creating Hoppscotch

benefits.heading: Benefits & balance

1.description: Our entire company is distributed, so we take remote work seriously. If you‚Äôd rather not work from home, we will cover the cost of a co-working or office space.
1.title: Remote

2.description: We're an asynchronous remote team working in different time zones, from GMT-4 to GMT+5:30. Choose the hours and days that work best for you.
2.title: Flexible days and hours

3.description: Employees receive generous medical, dental, vision, and life insurance. Full-time contractors will have the cost of healthcare factored into their salary. Our recruiting team can help confirm which applies to you.
3.title: Healthcare

4.description: We would love to give an annual sponsorship to any open source project of your choice.
4.title: Open source sponsorship

5.description: Hoppscotch provides $3,000 for employees to attend conferences, take classes, buy books, or otherwise further their education.
5.title: Learning

6.description: We typically meet up a couple of times a year in person for work and fun! What will be our next location? NYC, London, LA, or Barcelona? Help us decide!
6.title: Gatherings

7.description: Hoppscotch will let you choose a new laptop of your choice and will reimburse you for any other accessories you need to do your best work.
7.title: Top-notch equipments

8.description: At Hoppscotch, we really love swags. Every team member gets unlimited credits to grab any official Hoppscotch swags that she or he wishes.
8.title: Unlimited swags

9.description: Get generous stock options for a company that is growing blazing fast and is backed by top VCs and angels.
9.title: Stock options

benefits.subheading: We're committed to providing a safe, stable, and rewarding environment for our team members.

form.heading: Apply

message.label: What is most important to you in your next role?

form.success_message_subheading: We'll reach out to you in 3-5 days if we decide to proceed with your application.

hero.heading: Join Hoppscotch
hero.subheading: We‚Äôre on a mission to empower developers to focus on their work of creating software, and we‚Äôd like your help to get there.

hiringProcess.heading: Interview process

tips.2: We will reach out to you in 3-5 days.

tips.1: We answer any questions you have.
tips.2: We talk about specific compensation and the role.
tips.3: We'll arrange a 60-min call with our tech team.

tips.1: You join our CTO / tech team members for a 60 min technical interview.
tips.3: You get invited to all our internal stuff right about here.

3.title: A 60-min phone call with CTO / tech team

tips.1: You join our CEO for a 60 min casual interview.
tips.2: We talk about the work culture, tools, and vision of Hoppscotch.
tips.3: After the call, you'll receive an email in 2 days.

hiringProcess.subheading: A few tips to help you get the most out of your interview with us.

1.description: We‚Äôre building a company where team members set their own quality bar, take pride in their workmanship, and are trusted to do their life's best work without supervision.
1.title: We trust in autonomy

2.description: We believe that shipping software is a positive-sum endeavor ‚Äî there are no winners and losers at Hoppscotch. No bureaucracy and paper pushing. No interpersonal scorecards. We play together as a team, and we win as a team. We're working really hard to keep it that way.
2.title: We see work as positive-sum

3.description: We have a longer weekly meeting on Monday where we catch up on each other weekends and discuss goals for the week and then shorter stand-ups on Wednesday and Friday morning.
3.title: We don't rely too much on meetings

4.description: Building a meaningful company that has a massive impact takes time. We plan to run to the last mile and do it with great care for health and wellbeing. As important as work is to us, it isn't everything.
4.title: We believe this is a marathon, not a sprint

5.description: We move fast, operating mostly on Zoom and Slack. When we want company, we casually hang out and work together in Discord. We use email and Notion for long-form writing, which we encourage when communicating more complex subjects. We rely on Figma for design and prototyping ideas.
5.title: Modern tooling

6.description: It's easy to say these words, and it's hard to live by them. We make it a real point to try.
6.title: We do our best to live by these values

1.description: Help us create outstanding user interfaces for our users
1.title: User Interface and Experience Designer

1.description: As a full-stack engineer, you should be an expert in software coding languages, tools, frameworks, and platforms to create high-level designs.
1.title: Full-stack Engineer

2.description: You will be responsible for maintaining and managing the back-end infrastructure of our software applications.
2.title: Back-end Engineer

3.description: You will be responsible for building a highly performant and minimal UI.
3.title: Front-end Engineer

4.description: As a DevOps engineer, you will be responsible for making the lives of our development team easier
4.title: DevOps Engineer

openPositions.heading: Open Positions

1.description: Help us to develop product strategies through market research and identify specifications.
1.title: Product Manager

2.description: Help us reach out to our users and educate the community.
2.title: Developer Relations Manager

openPositions.subheading: We're always looking for new developers to join our team.

hero.heading: Changelog
hero.subheading: New updates and improvements to Hoppscotch.

improved_curl.description: Code editors now occupy full height of the section, and cURL importer now has a paste from clipboard button.
improved_curl.title: Improved code editors and cURL importer

improved_env.description: Environment variables now respect mixed strings in endpoints and are more intuitive.
improved_env.title: Improved environment variables in request section

new_importer.description: Collection importer now supports importing from Postman and Insomnia collections.
new_importer.title: Added support to Postman and Insomnia collections

single_collection.description: Users can now export and import single collection from collection's menu.
single_collection.title: Import and export single collection

snappy_teams.description: Teams and collections are now faster and more intuitive.
snappy_teams.title: Snappy teams and collections

updated_hungarian_translations.description: Translations are now updated to match the latest strings.
updated_hungarian_translations.title: Updated Hungarian translations

urlencoded.description: Adding URL encoded body type now support key-value pairs and raw YAML editor.
urlencoded.title: Better URL encoded body type

hero.heading: Features
hero.subheading: Some two line para about protocols of Hoppscotch.

graphql.description: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data. GraphQL provides a complete and understandable description of the data in your API.

collections.description: Just Like Rest API collections, Hoppscotch lets you organize your GraphQL queries in collections.You can Import existing collections(JSON) to replace current collection, or preserve current collection as well as add new collection from your sources. Collections can be Exported as JSON as well.
collections.title: Collections

headers.description: The editor lets you add header-value pairs to your GraphQL Request. Use case:Accessing a secure endpoint may need Authentication.
headers.title: Headers

history.description: All your recent Requests can be accessed from the History tab, and you can pick up right were left it.
history.title: History

queries.description: Any Queries to be made to the GraphQL endpoint are typed out in this section, there is an inbuilt formatter that Prettifies the Query.
queries.title: Queries

response.description: The response returned by the endpoint on your query is displayed at the end of the page, this can be copied to your clipboard or exported as a JSON file.
response.title: Response

schema.description: You can view the schema of GraphQL Endpoint that you‚Äôve connected to in this panel. The Schema can be downloaded as a JSON file or copied to your clipboard.
schema.title: Schema

schemaDoc.description: In the right sidebar you can view the documentation of the GraphQL endpoint you are working with. The documentation is searchable and documentation for Queries, Mutations, Subscriptions and Types are present in the Tabs below the search bar.
schemaDoc.title: Schema Documentation

url.description: Enter The URL of the GraphQL End point here.
url.title: URL

graphql.title: GraphQL

grpc.description: Hoppscotch helps you develop Real-time web apps that require persistent connection between the server and client.

mqtt.description: Once connected to the MQTT (Message Queuing Telemetry Transport) server, You can either publish a message under a topic or subscribe to a topic to get messages pertaining to that topic being sent across the server in real-time.
mqtt.title: MQTT

socket.description: Enter Your Websocket URL, valid protocols and click on connect . Once successfully connected you can send messages and see the realtime response on the log pane.
socket.title: Socket.IO

sse.description: Enter Your Websocket URL, valid protocols and click on connect . Once successfully connected you can send messages and see the realtime response on the log pane.
sse.title: SSE

websocket.description: Enter Your Websocket URL, valid protocols and click on connect . Once successfully connected you can send messages and see the realtime response on the log pane.
websocket.title: WebSockets

grpc.title: GRPC platform

realtime.description: Hoppscotch helps you develop Real-time web apps that require persistent connection between the server and client.

websocket.title: WebSockets

realtime.title: Realtime platform

rest.description: You can make API requests and examine responses using Hoppscotch. An API request allows you to retrieve or send data to and from an API endpoint.

choosingMethod.description: User can select from any methods like GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH etc.
choosingMethod.title: Choosing Method

collections.description: Click on the save button, next to SEND, name your request and add to existing or new collections.
collections.title: Collections

dynamicBehavior.description: The editor allows you to add dynamic behaviour to requests and collections.This lets you add parameters, Headers, Authentication, build pre-request scripts and write tests.
dynamicBehavior.title: Adding dynamic behavior to requests

environments.description: Environment variables allow you to store and reuse values in your requests and scripts
environments.title: Environments

responseBody.description: The response from the API endpoint can be viewed here. You can download or copy the response for further use.
responseBody.title: Response body

rest.title: RESTful platform

hero.heading: Get Support
hero.subheading: Need a bit of help or found some bugs ? Check out our current issues, GitHub discussions, or get email support.

1.description: We offer email based support. If you need SLAs, guaranteed response times, or have an issue, please contact us here.
1.title: Email Support
